Number of Iterations: 16 Final State: 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 2 3 


Report: 
The Production system had a total number of 9 iterations, while the heuristic test had 16. By this alone I can determine that the production system
was more efficient in this case. The production system could take more time however (depending on the order of the rules) while the heuristic method
would be constant (unless we changed the number of disks) because of this I would say that the heuristic test has the capability to be more efficient,
however if organized and ran properly the production system will usually be better than it.
